01355 
01356 
01357 const char* const vtk_type_names[] = { "bit",
01358                                        "char",
01359                                        "unsigned_char",
01360                                        "short",
01361                                        "unsigned_short",
01362                                        "int",
01363                                        "unsigned_int",
01364                                        "long",
01365                                        "unsigned_long",
01366                                        "float",
01367                                        "double",
01368                                        0 };
01369 
01370 void MeshImpl::read_vtk( const char* filename, MsqError &err )
01371 {
01372   int major, minor;
01373   char vendor_string[257];
01374   size_t i;
01375   
01376   FILE* file = fopen( filename, "r" );
01377   if (!file)
01378   {
01379     MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::FILE_ACCESS);
01380     return;
01381   }
01382   
01383     // Read file header
01384     
01385   if (!fgets( vendor_string, sizeof(vendor_string), file ))
01386   {
01387     MSQ_SETERR(err)( MsqError::IO_ERROR );
01388     fclose( file );
01389     return;
01390   }
01391   
01392   if (!strchr( vendor_string, '\n' ) ||
01393       2 != sscanf( vendor_string, "# vtk DataFile Version %d.%d", &major, &minor ))
01394   {
01395     MSQ_SETERR(err)( MsqError::FILE_FORMAT );
01396     fclose( file );
01397     return;
01398   }
01399   
01400   if (!fgets( vendor_string, sizeof(vendor_string), file )) 
01401   {
01402     MSQ_SETERR(err)( MsqError::IO_ERROR );
01403     fclose( file );
01404     return;
01405   }
01406   
01407     // VTK spec says this should not exceed 256 chars.
01408   if (!strchr( vendor_string, '\n' ))
01409   {
01410     MSQ_SETERR(err)( "Vendor string (line 2) exceeds 256 characters.",
01411                       MsqError::PARSE_ERROR);
01412     fclose( file );
01413     return;
01414   }
01415   
01416   
01417     // Check file type
01418   
01419   FileTokenizer tokens( file );
01420   const char* const file_type_names[] = { "ASCII", "BINARY", 0 };
01421   int filetype = tokens.match_token( file_type_names, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01422   if (2 == filetype) {
01423     MSQ_SETERR(err)( "Cannot read BINARY VTK files -- use ASCII.",
01424                      MsqError::NOT_IMPLEMENTED );
01425     return;
01426   }
01427 
01428     // Clear any existing data
01429   this->clear();
01430 
01431   const char* outer_block_names[] = { "DATASET", "FIELD", 0 };
01432     // Read the mesh
01433     // VTK docs are inconsistant with regard to whether or not 
01434     // a field block should be specified as "FIELD" or "DATASET FIELD",
01435     // so allow both.
01436   while (!tokens.eof()) 
01437   {
01438     int blocktype = tokens.match_token( outer_block_names, err ); 
01439     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) 
01440     {
01441       if (tokens.eof())
01442       {
01443         err.clear();
01444         break;
01445       }
01446       else
01447         return;
01448     }
01449     
01450     if (blocktype == 1)
01451     {
01452       vtk_read_dataset( tokens, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01453     }
01454     else
01455     {
01456       vtk_read_field( tokens, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01457     }
01458   }
01459   
01460     // Make sure file actually contained some mesh
01461   if (myMesh->num_elements() == 0)
01462   {
01463     MSQ_SETERR(err)("File contained no mesh.", MsqError::PARSE_ERROR);
01464     return;
01465   }
01466   
01467     // There is no option for a 2-D mesh in VTK files.  Always 3
01468   numCoords = 3;
01469 
01470     // Convert tag data for fixed nodes to internal bitmap
01471   std::vector<bool> flags;
01472   tag_to_bool( "fixed", flags, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01473   if (!flags.empty()) {
01474     for (i = 0; i < myMesh->max_vertex_index(); ++i)
01475       myMesh->fix_vertex( i, flags[i], err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01476   }
01477   
01478   flags.clear();
01479   tag_to_bool( "slaved", flags, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01480   if (!flags.empty()) {
01481     for (i = 0; i < myMesh->max_vertex_index(); ++i)
01482       myMesh->slave_vertex( i, flags[i], err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01483   }
01484 }
01485 
01486 void MeshImpl::tag_to_bool( const char* tag_name, 
01487                             std::vector<bool>& values,
01488                             MsqError& err )
01489 {
01490     // Convert tag data for fixed nodes to internal bitmap
01491   TagHandle handle = tag_get( tag_name, err );
01492   if (!handle || MSQ_CHKERR(err)) {
01493     err.clear();
01494     values.clear();
01495     return;
01496   }
01497   
01498   size_t i;
01499   values.resize( myMesh->max_vertex_index(), false );
01500   const TagDescription& tag_desc = myTags->properties( (size_t)handle, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01501   bool havedata = myTags->tag_has_vertex_data( (size_t)handle, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01502   if (!havedata)
01503   {
01504     MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::FILE_FORMAT, "'%s' attribute on elements, not vertices", tag_name);
01505     return;
01506   }
01507 
01508   switch( tag_desc.type )
01509   {
01510     case BYTE:
01511     {
01512       char data;
01513       for (i = 0; i < myMesh->max_vertex_index(); ++i)
01514       {
01515         myTags->get_vertex_data( (size_t)handle, 1, &i, &data, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01516         values[i] = !!data;
01517       }
01518       break;
01519     }
01520     case BOOL:
01521     {
01522       for (i = 0; i < myMesh->max_vertex_index(); ++i)
01523       {
01524         bool data;
01525         myTags->get_vertex_data( (size_t)handle, 1, &i, &data, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01526         values[i] = data;
01527       }
01528       break;
01529     }
01530     case INT:
01531     {
01532       int data;
01533       for (i = 0; i < myMesh->max_vertex_index(); ++i)
01534       {
01535         myTags->get_vertex_data( (size_t)handle, 1, &i, &data, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01536         values[i] = !!data;
01537       }
01538       break;
01539     }
01540     case DOUBLE:
01541     {
01542       double data;
01543       for (i = 0; i < myMesh->max_vertex_index(); ++i)
01544       {
01545         myTags->get_vertex_data( (size_t)handle, 1, &i, &data, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01546         values[i] = !!data;
01547       }
01548       break;
01549     }
01550     case HANDLE:
01551     {
01552       unsigned long data;
01553       for (i = 0; i < myMesh->max_vertex_index(); ++i)
01554       {
01555         myTags->get_vertex_data( (size_t)handle, 1, &i, &data, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01556         values[i] = !!data;
01557       }
01558       break;
01559     }
01560     default:
01561       MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::PARSE_ERROR, "'%s' attribute has invalid type", tag_name);
01562       return;
01563   }
01564   
01565   tag_delete( handle, err );
01566 }
01567 
01568 void MeshImpl::vtk_read_dataset( FileTokenizer& tokens, MsqError& err )
01569 {
01570   const char* const data_type_names[] = { "STRUCTURED_POINTS",
01571                                           "STRUCTURED_GRID",
01572                                           "UNSTRUCTURED_GRID",
01573                                           "POLYDATA",
01574                                           "RECTILINEAR_GRID",
01575                                           "FIELD",
01576                                           0 };
01577   int datatype = tokens.match_token( data_type_names, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01578   
01579   
01580     // Ignore FIELD data at beginning of DATASET. As far as I (J.Kraftcheck)
01581     // understand the VTK documentation, there should never be a FIELD block
01582     // inside a dataset, except in attribute data.  However, some app somewhere
01583     // writes them this way, so try to handle them.
01584   for (;;)
01585   {
01586     tokens.match_token( "FIELD", err );
01587     if (err) 
01588     {
01589       tokens.unget_token();
01590       err.clear();
01591       break;
01592     }
01593     vtk_read_field( tokens, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01594   }
01595     
01596   
01597   switch( datatype )
01598   {
01599     case 1: vtk_read_structured_points( tokens, err ); break;
01600     case 2: vtk_read_structured_grid  ( tokens, err ); break;
01601     case 3: vtk_read_unstructured_grid( tokens, err ); break;
01602     case 4: vtk_read_polydata         ( tokens, err ); break;
01603     case 5: vtk_read_rectilinear_grid ( tokens, err ); break;
01604     case 6: vtk_read_field            ( tokens, err ); break;
01605   }
01606 
01607   
01608     // Read attribute data 
01609   const char* const block_type_names[] = { "POINT_DATA", "CELL_DATA", "DATASET", 0 };
01610   int blocktype = 0;
01611   while (!tokens.eof())
01612   {
01613       // get POINT_DATA or CELL_DATA
01614     int new_block_type = tokens.match_token( block_type_names, err );
01615     if (new_block_type == 3) // done reading attributes
01616     {
01617       tokens.unget_token();
01618       return;
01619     }
01620     
01621     if (err)
01622     {
01623       if (tokens.eof())
01624       {
01625         err.clear();
01626         break;
01627       }
01628         // If next token was neither POINT_DATA nor CELL_DATA,
01629         // then there's another attribute under the current one.
01630       if (blocktype)
01631       {
01632         tokens.unget_token();
01633         err.clear();
01634       }
01635       else
01636       {
01637         MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01638       }
01639     }
01640     else
01641     {
01642       blocktype = new_block_type;
01643       long count;
01644       tokens.get_long_ints( 1, &count, err); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01645       
01646       if (blocktype == 1 && (unsigned long)count != myMesh->num_vertices())
01647       {
01648         MSQ_SETERR(err)( MsqError::PARSE_ERROR,
01649                          "Count inconsistent with number of vertices" 
01650                          " at line %d.", tokens.line_number());
01651         return;
01652       }
01653       else if (blocktype == 2 && (unsigned long)count != myMesh->num_elements())
01654       {
01655          MSQ_SETERR(err)( MsqError::PARSE_ERROR,
01656                          "Count inconsistent with number of elements" 
01657                          " at line %d.", tokens.line_number());
01658         return;
01659       }
01660     }
01661       
01662    
01663     if (blocktype == 1)
01664       vtk_read_point_data( tokens, err );
01665     else
01666       vtk_read_cell_data ( tokens, err );
01667     MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01668   }
01669 }
01670 
01671 
01672 void MeshImpl::vtk_read_structured_points( FileTokenizer& tokens, MsqError& err )
01673 {
01674   long i, j, k;
01675   long dims[3];
01676   double origin[3], space[3];
01677  
01678   tokens.match_token( "DIMENSIONS", err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01679   tokens.get_long_ints( 3, dims, err );    MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01680   tokens.get_newline( err );               MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01681   
01682   if (dims[0] < 1 || dims[1] < 1 || dims[2] < 1)
01683   {
01684     MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::PARSE_ERROR,
01685                    "Invalid dimension at line %d", 
01686                    tokens.line_number());
01687     return;
01688   }
01689   
01690   tokens.match_token( "ORIGIN", err );     MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01691   tokens.get_doubles( 3, origin, err );    MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01692   tokens.get_newline( err );               MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01693   
01694   const char* const spacing_names[] = { "SPACING", "ASPECT_RATIO", 0 };
01695   tokens.match_token( spacing_names, err );MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01696   tokens.get_doubles( 3, space, err );     MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01697   tokens.get_newline( err );               MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01698   
01699   myMesh->allocate_vertices( dims[0]*dims[1]*dims[2], err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01700   size_t vtx = 0;
01701   Vector3D off( origin[0], origin[1], origin[2] );
01702   for (k = 0; k < dims[2]; ++k)
01703     for (j = 0; j < dims[1]; ++j)
01704       for (i = 0; i < dims[0]; ++i)
01705       {
01706         myMesh->reset_vertex( vtx++, off + Vector3D( i*space[0], j*space[1], k*space[2] ), false, err ); 
01707         MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01708       }
01709 
01710   vtk_create_structured_elems( dims, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01711 }
01712 
01713 void MeshImpl::vtk_read_structured_grid( FileTokenizer& tokens, MsqError& err )
01714 {
01715   long num_verts, dims[3];
01716  
01717   tokens.match_token( "DIMENSIONS", err );   MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01718   tokens.get_long_ints( 3, dims, err );      MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01719   tokens.get_newline( err );                 MSQ_ERRRTN(err); 
01720   
01721   if (dims[0] < 1 || dims[1] < 1 || dims[2] < 1)
01722   {
01723     MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::PARSE_ERROR,
01724                    "Invalid dimension at line %d", 
01725                    tokens.line_number());
01726     return;
01727   }
01728   
01729   tokens.match_token( "POINTS", err );        MSQ_ERRRTN(err); 
01730   tokens.get_long_ints( 1, &num_verts, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err); 
01731   tokens.match_token( vtk_type_names, err );  MSQ_ERRRTN(err); 
01732   tokens.get_newline( err );                  MSQ_ERRRTN(err); 
01733   
01734   if (num_verts != (dims[0] * dims[1] * dims[2]))
01735   {
01736     MSQ_SETERR(err)( MsqError::PARSE_ERROR,
01737                     "Point count not consistent with dimensions "
01738                     "at line %d", tokens.line_number() );
01739     return;
01740   }
01741   
01742   myMesh->allocate_vertices( num_verts, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01743   for (size_t vtx = 0; vtx < (size_t)num_verts; ++vtx)
01744   {
01745     Vector3D pos;
01746     tokens.get_doubles( 3, const_cast<double*>(pos.to_array()), err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01747     myMesh->reset_vertex( vtx, pos, false, err );  MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01748   }
01749  
01750   vtk_create_structured_elems( dims, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01751 }
01752 
01753 void MeshImpl::vtk_read_rectilinear_grid( FileTokenizer& tokens, MsqError& err )
01754 {
01755   int i, j, k;
01756   long dims[3];
01757   const char* labels[] = { "X_COORDINATES", "Y_COORDINATES", "Z_COORDINATES" };
01758   vector<double> coords[3];
01759   
01760   tokens.match_token( "DIMENSIONS", err );                   MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01761   tokens.get_long_ints( 3, dims, err );                     MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01762   tokens.get_newline( err );                                MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01763   
01764   if (dims[0] < 1 || dims[1] < 1 || dims[2] < 1)
01765   {
01766      MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::PARSE_ERROR,
01767                    "Invalid dimension at line %d", 
01768                    tokens.line_number());
01769     return;
01770   }
01771 
01772   for (i = 0; i < 3; i++)
01773   {
01774     long count;
01775     tokens.match_token( labels[i], err );                   MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01776     tokens.get_long_ints( 1, &count, err );                 MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01777     tokens.match_token( vtk_type_names, err );              MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01778     tokens.get_newline( err );                              MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01779     
01780     if (count != dims[i])
01781     {
01782       MSQ_SETERR(err)( MsqError::PARSE_ERROR,
01783                        "Coordinate count inconsistent with dimensions"
01784                        " at line %d", tokens.line_number());
01785       return;
01786     }
01787     
01788     coords[i].resize(count);
01789     tokens.get_doubles( count, &coords[i][0], err );   MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01790   }
01791   
01792   myMesh->allocate_vertices( dims[0]*dims[1]*dims[2], err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01793   size_t vtx = 0;
01794   for (k = 0; k < dims[2]; ++k)
01795     for (j = 0; j < dims[1]; ++j)
01796       for (i = 0; i < dims[0]; ++i)
01797       {
01798         myMesh->reset_vertex( vtx++, Vector3D( coords[0][i], coords[1][j], coords[2][k] ), false, err );
01799         MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01800       }
01801   
01802   
01803   vtk_create_structured_elems( dims, err );                 MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01804 }
01805 
01806 void MeshImpl::vtk_read_polydata( FileTokenizer& tokens, MsqError& err )
01807 {
01808   long num_verts;
01809   vector<int> connectivity;
01810   const char* const poly_data_names[] = { "VERTICES",
01811                                           "LINES",
01812                                           "POLYGONS",
01813                                           "TRIANGLE_STRIPS", 
01814                                           0 };
01815   
01816   tokens.match_token( "POINTS", err );                      MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01817   tokens.get_long_ints( 1, &num_verts, err );               MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01818   tokens.match_token( vtk_type_names, err );                MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01819   tokens.get_newline( err );                                MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01820   
01821   if (num_verts < 1)
01822   {
01823     MSQ_SETERR(err)( MsqError::PARSE_ERROR,
01824                      "Invalid point count at line %d", tokens.line_number());
01825     return;
01826   }
01827   
01828   myMesh->allocate_vertices( num_verts, err );              MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01829   for (size_t vtx = 0; vtx < (size_t)num_verts; ++vtx)
01830   {
01831     Vector3D pos;
01832     tokens.get_doubles( 3, const_cast<double*>(pos.to_array()), err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01833     myMesh->reset_vertex( vtx, pos, false, err );           MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01834   }
01835 
01836   int poly_type = tokens.match_token( poly_data_names, err );MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01837   switch (poly_type)
01838   {
01839     case 3:
01840       vtk_read_polygons( tokens, err );                     MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01841       break;
01842     case 4:
01843       MSQ_SETERR(err)( MsqError::NOT_IMPLEMENTED, 
01844                        "Unsupported type: triangle strips at line %d",
01845                        tokens.line_number() );
01846       return;
01847     case 1:
01848     case 2:
01849       MSQ_SETERR(err)( MsqError::NOT_IMPLEMENTED, 
01850                        "Entities of dimension < 2 at line %d",
01851                        tokens.line_number() );
01852       return;
01853   }
01854 }
01855 
01856 void MeshImpl::vtk_read_polygons( FileTokenizer& tokens, MsqError& err )
01857 {
01858   long size[2];
01859   
01860   tokens.get_long_ints( 2, size, err );                     MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01861   tokens.get_newline( err );                                MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01862   myMesh->allocate_elements( size[0], err );                MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01863   std::vector<long> conn;
01864 
01865   for (int i = 0; i < size[0]; ++i)
01866   {
01867     long count;
01868     tokens.get_long_ints( 1, &count, err );                 MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01869     conn.resize( count );
01870     tokens.get_long_ints( count, arrptr(conn), err );    MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01871     myMesh->reset_element( i, conn, POLYGON, err );         MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01872   } 
01873 }
01874 
01875 
01876 
01877 void MeshImpl::vtk_read_unstructured_grid( FileTokenizer& tokens, MsqError& err )
01878 {
01879   long i, num_verts, num_elems[2];
01880   
01881   tokens.match_token( "POINTS", err );                      MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01882   tokens.get_long_ints( 1, &num_verts, err );               MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01883   tokens.match_token( vtk_type_names, err );                MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01884   tokens.get_newline( err );                                MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01885   
01886   if (num_verts < 1)
01887   {
01888     MSQ_SETERR(err)( MsqError::PARSE_ERROR,
01889                      "Invalid point count at line %d", tokens.line_number());
01890     return;
01891   }
01892   
01893   myMesh->allocate_vertices( num_verts, err );              MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01894   for (size_t vtx = 0; vtx < (size_t)num_verts; ++vtx)
01895   {
01896     Vector3D pos;
01897     tokens.get_doubles( 3, const_cast<double*>(pos.to_array()), err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01898     myMesh->reset_vertex( vtx, pos, false, err );           MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01899   }
01900   
01901   tokens.match_token( "CELLS", err );                       MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01902   tokens.get_long_ints( 2, num_elems, err );                MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01903   tokens.get_newline( err );                                MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01904 
01905   myMesh->allocate_elements( num_elems[0], err );           MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01906   std::vector<long> conn;
01907   for (i = 0; i < num_elems[0]; ++i)
01908   {
01909     long count;
01910     tokens.get_long_ints( 1, &count, err);                  MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01911     conn.resize( count );
01912     tokens.get_long_ints( count, arrptr(conn), err );    MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01913     myMesh->reset_element( i, conn, MIXED, err );           MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01914   }
01915  
01916   tokens.match_token( "CELL_TYPES", err );                  MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01917   tokens.get_long_ints( 1, &num_elems[1], err );            MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01918   tokens.get_newline( err );                                MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01919   
01920   if (num_elems[0] != num_elems[1])
01921   {
01922     MSQ_SETERR(err)( MsqError::PARSE_ERROR,
01923                     "Number of element types does not match number of elements"
01924                     "at line %d", tokens.line_number() );
01925     return;
01926   }
01927   
01928   std::vector<size_t> tconn;
01929   for (i = 0; i < num_elems[0]; ++i)
01930   {
01931     long type;
01932     size_t size;
01933     tokens.get_long_ints( 1, &type, err );                      MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01934 
01935       // Check if type is a valid value
01936     const VtkTypeInfo* info = VtkTypeInfo::find_type( type, err );   
01937     if (err || !info || !info->numNodes)
01938     {
01939       MSQ_SETERR(err)( MsqError::PARSE_ERROR,
01940                        "Invalid cell type %ld at line %d.",
01941                        type, tokens.line_number() );
01942       return;
01943     }
01944       // Check if Mesquite supports the type
01945     if (info->msqType == MIXED)
01946     {
01947       MSQ_SETERR(err)( MsqError::UNSUPPORTED_ELEMENT,
01948                        "Unsupported cell type %ld (%s) at line %d.",
01949                        type, info->name, tokens.line_number() );
01950       return;
01951     }
01952     
01953       // If node-ordering is not the same as exodus...
01954     if (info->vtkConnOrder)
01955     {
01956       size = myMesh->element_connectivity( i, err ).size();     MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01957       if (info->numNodes != size)
01958       {
01959         MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::UNSUPPORTED_ELEMENT,
01960           "Cell type %ld (%s) for element with %d nodes at Line %d",
01961           type, info->name, (int)size, tokens.line_number() ); 
01962         return;
01963       }
01964       
01965       tconn.resize( size );
01966       const std::vector<size_t>& conn = myMesh->element_connectivity( i, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01967       for (size_t j = 0; j < size; ++j)
01968       {
01969         tconn[j] = conn[info->vtkConnOrder[j]];
01970       }
01971         
01972       myMesh->reset_element( i, tconn, info->msqType, err );MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01973     }
01974       // Othewise (if node ordering is the same), just set the type.
01975     else
01976     {
01977       myMesh->element_topology( i, info->msqType, err );MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
01978     }
01979   } // for(i)
01980 }
01981 
01982 void MeshImpl::vtk_create_structured_elems( const long* dims, 
01983                                             MsqError& err )
01984 {
01985     //NOTE: this should be work fine for edges also if 
01986     //      Mesquite ever supports them.  Just add the
01987     //      type for dimension 1 to the switch statement.
01988     
01989   //int non_zero[3] = {0,0,0};  // True if dim > 0 for x, y, z respectively
01990   long elem_dim = 0;          // Element dimension (2->quad, 3->hex)
01991   long num_elems = 1;         // Total number of elements
01992   long vert_per_elem;         // Element connectivity length
01993   long edims[3] = { 1, 1, 1 };// Number of elements in each grid direction
01994   
01995     // Populate above data
01996   for (int d = 0; d < 3; d++) 
01997     if (dims[d] > 1)
01998     {
01999       //non_zero[elem_dim] = d;
02000       edims[d] = dims[d] - 1;
02001       num_elems *= edims[d];
02002       elem_dim++;
02003     }
02004   vert_per_elem = 1 << elem_dim;
02005   
02006     // Get element type from element dimension
02007   EntityTopology type;
02008   switch( elem_dim )
02009   {
02010   //case 1: type = EDGE;          break;
02011     case 2: type = QUADRILATERAL; break;
02012     case 3: type = HEXAHEDRON;    break;
02013     default:
02014       MSQ_SETERR(err)( "Cannot create structured mesh with elements "
02015                        "of dimension < 2 or > 3.",
02016                        MsqError::NOT_IMPLEMENTED );
02017       return;
02018   }
02019 
02020     // Allocate storage for elements
02021   myMesh->allocate_elements( num_elems, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
02022   
02023     // Offsets of element vertices in grid relative to corner closest to origin 
02024   long k = dims[0]*dims[1];
02025   const long corners[8] = { 0, 1, 1+dims[0], dims[0], k, k+1, k+1+dims[0], k+dims[0] };
02026                              
02027     // Populate element list
02028   std::vector<size_t> conn( vert_per_elem );
02029   size_t elem_idx = 0;
02030   for (long z = 0; z < edims[2]; ++z)
02031     for (long y = 0; y < edims[1]; ++y)
02032       for (long x = 0; x < edims[0]; ++x)
02033       {
02034         const long index = x + y*dims[0] + z*(dims[0]*dims[1]);
02035         for (long j = 0; j < vert_per_elem; ++j)
02036           conn[j] = index + corners[j];
02037         myMesh->reset_element( elem_idx++, conn, type, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
02038       }
02039 }
02040 
02041 void* MeshImpl::vtk_read_field_data( FileTokenizer& tokens, 
02042                                      size_t count, 
02043                                      size_t num_fields,
02044                                      const std::string& field_name,
02045                                      TagDescription& tag, 
02046                                      MsqError& err )
02047 {
02048   tag.member = tokens.get_string(err);                  MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
02049     // If field is a struct containing multiple members, make
02050     // tag name the concatentation of the field name and member
02051     // name.
02052   if (num_fields > 1)
02053   {
02054     tag.name = field_name;
02055     tag.name += " ";
02056     tag.name += tag.member;
02057     tag.member.clear();
02058   }
02059     // If field contains only one member, then make the tag
02060     // name be the field name, and store the member name to 
02061     // preserve it for subsequent writes.
02062   else
02063   {
02064     tag.name = field_name;
02065   }
02066 
02067     // Get tuple size and count from the file.
02068   long sizes[2];
02069   tokens.get_long_ints( 2, sizes, err );                MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
02070   if (sizes[0] < 1) {
02071     MSQ_SETERR(err)( MsqError::PARSE_ERROR,
02072                      "Invalid tuple size (%ld) for field data %s at line %d\n",
02073                      sizes[0], tag.name.c_str(),
02074                      tokens.line_number() );
02075     return 0;
02076   }
02077   if (sizes[1] < 0 || (count && (size_t)sizes[1] != count)) {
02078     MSQ_SETERR(err)( MsqError::PARSE_ERROR,
02079                      "Invalid field data length at line %d.  "
02080                      "Cannot map %lu tuples to  %ld entities.\n", 
02081                      tokens.line_number(),
02082                      (unsigned long)count, sizes[1] );
02083     return 0;
02084   }
02085   
02086   int type = tokens.match_token( vtk_type_names, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
02087   void* result = vtk_read_typed_data( tokens, type, sizes[0], sizes[1], tag, err );
02088   MSQ_CHKERR(err);
02089   return result;
02090 }
02091 
02092 void MeshImpl::vtk_read_field( FileTokenizer& tokens, MsqError& err )
02093 {
02094     // This is not supported yet.
02095     // Parse the data but throw it away because
02096     // Mesquite has no internal representation for it.
02097   
02098   std::string name = tokens.get_string(err); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
02099   int count;
02100   tokens.get_integers( 1, &count, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
02101   
02102   for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)
02103   {
02104     TagDescription tag;
02105     void* ptr = vtk_read_field_data( tokens, 0, 1, "", tag, err );
02106     if (ptr)
02107       free( ptr );
02108     MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
02109   }
02110 }
02111 
02112 void* MeshImpl::vtk_read_attrib_data( FileTokenizer& tokens, 
02113                                       long count,
02114                                       TagDescription& tag,
02115                                       MsqError& err )
02116 {
02117   const char* const type_names[] = { "SCALARS",
02118                                      "COLOR_SCALARS",
02119                                      "VECTORS",
02120                                      "NORMALS",
02121                                      "TEXTURE_COORDINATES",
02122                                      "TENSORS",
02123                                      "FIELD",
02124   // Some buggy VTK files have empty CELL_DATA/POINT_DATA blocks
02125   // Try to allow them by checking for possible other tokens
02126   // indicating the end of the block
02127                                      "POINT_DATA",
02128                                      "CELL_DATA",
02129                                      "DATASET",
02130                                      0 };
02131 
02132   int type = tokens.match_token( type_names, err );  MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
02133   if (type > 7) // empty CELL_DATA/POINT_DATA block.
02134   {
02135     tag.vtkType = TagDescription::NONE;
02136     tokens.unget_token();  
02137     return 0;
02138   }
02139   
02140   const char* name = tokens.get_string( err );       MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
02141   tag.name = name;
02142   
02143   void* data = 0;
02144   switch( type )
02145   {
02146     case 1: data = vtk_read_scalar_attrib ( tokens, count, tag, err ); 
02147             tag.vtkType = TagDescription::SCALAR; 
02148             break;
02149     case 2: data = vtk_read_color_attrib  ( tokens, count, tag, err ); 
02150             tag.vtkType = TagDescription::COLOR;
02151             break;
02152     case 3: data = vtk_read_vector_attrib ( tokens, count, tag, err );
02153             tag.vtkType = TagDescription::VECTOR;
02154             break;
02155     case 4: data = vtk_read_vector_attrib ( tokens, count, tag, err ); 
02156             tag.vtkType = TagDescription::NORMAL;
02157             break;
02158     case 5: data = vtk_read_texture_attrib( tokens, count, tag, err ); 
02159             tag.vtkType = TagDescription::TEXTURE;
02160             break;
02161     case 6: data = vtk_read_tensor_attrib ( tokens, count, tag, err ); 
02162             tag.vtkType = TagDescription::TENSOR;
02163             break;
02164     case 7: data = 0;
02165             tag.vtkType = TagDescription::FIELD;
02166             break;
02167   }
02168 
02169   return data;
02170 }
02171 
02172 void MeshImpl::vtk_read_point_data( FileTokenizer& tokens, 
02173                                     MsqError& err )
02174 {
02175   TagDescription tag;
02176   void* data = vtk_read_attrib_data( tokens, myMesh->num_vertices(), tag, err );
02177   if (data) // normal attribute
02178   {
02179     vtk_store_point_data( data, tag, err );
02180     free(data);
02181     MSQ_CHKERR(err);
02182     return;;
02183   }
02184   else if (tag.vtkType == TagDescription::FIELD)
02185   {
02186     std::string field = tag.name;
02187     int field_count;
02188     tokens.get_integers( 1, &field_count, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
02189     for (int i = 0; i < field_count; ++i)
02190     {
02191       data = vtk_read_field_data( tokens, myMesh->num_vertices(), field_count, field, tag, err );
02192       MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
02193       vtk_store_point_data( data, tag, err );
02194       free( data );
02195       MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
02196     }
02197   }
02198 }
02199   
02200 void MeshImpl::vtk_store_point_data( const void* data, TagDescription& tag, MsqError& err )
02201 {  
02202   size_t tag_handle = myTags->handle( tag.name, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
02203   if (!tag_handle)
02204   {
02205     tag_handle = myTags->create( tag, 0, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
02206   }
02207   else 
02208   {
02209     const TagDescription& desc = myTags->properties( tag_handle, err );  MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
02210     if (desc != tag)
02211     {
02212       MSQ_SETERR(err)( MsqError::PARSE_ERROR,
02213                        "Inconsistent types between element "
02214                        "and vertex attributes named \"%s\"\n",
02215                        tag.name.c_str() );
02216       return;
02217     }
02218   }
02219   
02220   std::vector<size_t> vertex_handles;
02221   myMesh->all_vertices( vertex_handles, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
02222   if (!vertex_handles.empty()) 
02223     myTags->set_vertex_data( tag_handle, 
02224                              vertex_handles.size(),
02225                              arrptr(vertex_handles),
02226                              data,
02227                              err );  MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
02228 }
02229 
02230 
02231 void MeshImpl::vtk_read_cell_data( FileTokenizer& tokens, 
02232                                    MsqError& err )
02233 {
02234   TagDescription tag;
02235   void* data = vtk_read_attrib_data( tokens, myMesh->num_elements(), tag, err );
02236   if (data) // normal attribute
02237   {
02238     vtk_store_cell_data( data, tag, err );
02239     free(data);
02240     MSQ_CHKERR(err);
02241     return;;
02242   }
02243   else if (tag.vtkType == TagDescription::FIELD)
02244   {
02245     std::string field = tag.name;
02246     int field_count;
02247     tokens.get_integers( 1, &field_count, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
02248     for (int i = 0; i < field_count; ++i)
02249     {
02250       data = vtk_read_field_data( tokens, myMesh->num_elements(), field_count, field, tag, err );
02251       MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
02252       vtk_store_cell_data( data, tag, err );
02253       free( data );
02254       MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
02255     }
02256   }
02257 }
02258 
02259 void MeshImpl::vtk_store_cell_data( const void* data, TagDescription& tag, MsqError& err )
02260 {  
02261   size_t tag_handle = myTags->handle( tag.name, err );  MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
02262   if (!tag_handle)
02263   {
02264     tag_handle = myTags->create( tag, 0, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
02265   }
02266   else 
02267   {
02268     const TagDescription& desc = myTags->properties( tag_handle, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
02269     if (desc != tag)
02270     {
02271       MSQ_SETERR(err)( MsqError::PARSE_ERROR,
02272                        "Inconsistent types between element "
02273                        "and vertex attributes named \"%s\"\n",
02274                        tag.name.c_str() );
02275       return;
02276     }
02277   }
02278   
02279   std::vector<size_t> element_handles;
02280   myMesh->all_elements( element_handles, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
02281   if (!element_handles.empty()) 
02282     myTags->set_element_data( tag_handle, 
02283                               element_handles.size(),
02284                               arrptr(element_handles),
02285                               data,
02286                               err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
02287 }
02288 
02289 void* MeshImpl::vtk_read_typed_data( FileTokenizer& tokens, 
02290                                      int type, 
02291                                      size_t per_elem, 
02292                                      size_t num_elem,
02293                                      TagDescription& tag,
02294                                      MsqError &err )
02295 {
02296   void* data_ptr;
02297   size_t count = per_elem * num_elem;
02298   switch ( type )
02299   {
02300     case 1:
02301       tag.size = per_elem*sizeof(bool);
02302       tag.type = BOOL;
02303       data_ptr = malloc( num_elem*tag.size );
02304       tokens.get_booleans( count, (bool*)data_ptr, err );
02305       break;
02306     case 2:
02307     case 3:
02308     case 4:
02309     case 5:
02310     case 6:
02311     case 7:
02312       tag.size = per_elem*sizeof(int);
02313       tag.type = INT;
02314       data_ptr = malloc( num_elem*tag.size );
02315       tokens.get_integers( count, (int*)data_ptr, err );
02316       break;
02317     case 8:
02318     case 9:
02319       // this is a bit of a hack since MeshImpl doesn't have a LONG type (HANDLE is used by ParallelMesh for long)
02320       tag.size = per_elem*sizeof(size_t);
02321       assert(sizeof(long) == sizeof(size_t));
02322       assert(sizeof(long) == sizeof(void *));
02323       tag.type = HANDLE;
02324       data_ptr = malloc( num_elem*tag.size );
02325       tokens.get_long_ints( count, (long*)data_ptr, err );
02326       break;
02327     case 10:
02328     case 11:
02329       tag.size = per_elem*sizeof(double);
02330       tag.type = DOUBLE;
02331       data_ptr = malloc( num_elem*tag.size );
02332       tokens.get_doubles( count, (double*)data_ptr, err );
02333       break;
02334     default:
02335       MSQ_SETERR(err)( "Invalid data type", MsqError::INVALID_ARG );
02336       return 0;
02337   }
02338   
02339   if (MSQ_CHKERR(err))
02340   {
02341     free( data_ptr );
02342     return 0;
02343   }
02344   
02345   return data_ptr;
02346 }
02347   
02348       
02349       
02350 
02351 void* MeshImpl::vtk_read_scalar_attrib( FileTokenizer& tokens,
02352                                         long count,
02353                                         TagDescription& desc,
02354                                         MsqError& err )
02355 {
02356   if (!count)
02357     return 0;
02358 
02359   int type = tokens.match_token( vtk_type_names, err );      MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
02360     
02361   long size;
02362   const char* tok = tokens.get_string( err );                MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
02363   const char* end = 0;
02364   size = strtol( tok, (char**)&end, 0 );
02365   if (*end)
02366   {
02367     size = 1;
02368     tokens.unget_token();
02369   }
02370   
02371     // VTK spec says cannot be greater than 4--do we care?
02372   if (size < 1 || size > 4)
02373   {
02374     MSQ_SETERR(err)( MsqError::PARSE_ERROR,
02375                     "Scalar count out of range [1,4]" 
02376                     " at line %d", tokens.line_number());
02377     return 0;
02378   }
02379   
02380   tokens.match_token("LOOKUP_TABLE",err);                     MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
02381   tok = tokens.get_string(err);                               MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
02382   
02383     // If no lookup table, just read and return the data
02384   if (!strcmp( tok, "default" ))
02385   {
02386     void* ptr = vtk_read_typed_data( tokens, type, size, count, desc, err );
02387     MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
02388     return ptr;
02389   }
02390   
02391     // If we got this far, then the data has a lookup
02392     // table.  First read the lookup table and convert
02393     // to integers.
02394   string name = tok;
02395   vector<long> table( size*count );
02396   if (type > 0 && type < 10)  // Is an integer type
02397   {
02398     tokens.get_long_ints( table.size(), arrptr(table), err );   
02399     MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
02400   }
02401   else // Is a real-number type
02402   {
02403     for (std::vector<long>::iterator iter = table.begin(); iter != table.end(); ++iter)
02404     {
02405       double data;
02406       tokens.get_doubles( 1, &data, err );
02407       MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
02408 
02409       *iter = (long)data;
02410       if ((double)*iter != data)
02411       {
02412         MSQ_SETERR(err)( MsqError::PARSE_ERROR,
02413                          "Invalid lookup index (%.0f) at line %d",
02414                          data, tokens.line_number() );
02415         return 0;
02416       }
02417     }
02418   }
02419   
02420     // Now read the data - must be float RGBA color triples
02421   
02422   long table_count;
02423   tokens.match_token( "LOOKUP_TABLE", err );                  MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
02424   tokens.match_token( name.c_str(), err );                    MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
02425   tokens.get_long_ints( 1, &table_count, err );               MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
02426  
02427   vector<float> table_data(table_count*4);
02428   tokens.get_floats( table_data.size(), arrptr(table_data), err );MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
02429   
02430     // Create list from indexed data
02431   
02432   float* data = (float*)malloc( sizeof(float)*count*size*4 );
02433   float* data_iter = data;
02434   for (std::vector<long>::iterator idx = table.begin(); idx != table.end(); ++idx)
02435   {
02436     if (*idx < 0 || *idx >= table_count)
02437     {
02438       MSQ_SETERR(err)( MsqError::PARSE_ERROR,
02439                        "LOOKUP_TABLE index %ld out of range.",
02440                        *idx );
02441       free( data );
02442       return  0;
02443     }
02444     
02445     for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++)
02446     {
02447       *data_iter = table_data[4 * *idx + i];
02448       ++data_iter;
02449     }
02450   }
02451   
02452   desc.size = size * 4 * sizeof(float);
02453   desc.type = DOUBLE;
02454   return data;
02455 }
02456 
02457 void* MeshImpl::vtk_read_color_attrib( FileTokenizer& tokens, 
02458                                        long count, 
02459                                        TagDescription& tag,
02460                                        MsqError& err )
02461 {
02462   long size;
02463   tokens.get_long_ints( 1, &size, err );                    MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
02464   
02465   if (size < 1)
02466   {
02467     MSQ_SETERR(err)( MsqError::PARSE_ERROR, 
02468                      "Invalid size (%ld) at line %d",
02469                      size, tokens.line_number() );
02470     return 0;
02471   }
02472   
02473   float* data = (float*)malloc( sizeof(float)*count*size );
02474   tokens.get_floats( count*size, data, err );
02475   if (MSQ_CHKERR(err))
02476   {
02477     free( data );
02478     return 0;
02479   }
02480   
02481   tag.size = size*sizeof(float);
02482   tag.type = DOUBLE;
02483   return data;
02484 }
02485 
02486 void* MeshImpl::vtk_read_vector_attrib( FileTokenizer& tokens, 
02487                                         long count, 
02488                                         TagDescription& tag,
02489                                         MsqError& err )
02490 {
02491   int type = tokens.match_token( vtk_type_names, err );
02492   MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
02493     
02494   void* result = vtk_read_typed_data( tokens, type, 3, count, tag, err );
02495   MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
02496   return result;
02497 }
02498 
02499 void* MeshImpl::vtk_read_texture_attrib( FileTokenizer& tokens,
02500                                          long count,
02501                                          TagDescription& tag,
02502                                          MsqError& err )
02503 {
02504   int type, dim;
02505   tokens.get_integers( 1, &dim, err );
02506   MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
02507   type = tokens.match_token( vtk_type_names, err );
02508   MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
02509     
02510   if (dim < 1 || dim > 3)
02511   {
02512     MSQ_SETERR(err)( MsqError::PARSE_ERROR,
02513                      "Invalid dimension (%d) at line %d.",
02514                      dim, tokens.line_number() );
02515     return 0;
02516   }
02517   
02518   void* result = vtk_read_typed_data( tokens, type, dim, count, tag, err );
02519   MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
02520   return result;
02521 }
02522 
02523 void* MeshImpl::vtk_read_tensor_attrib( FileTokenizer& tokens,
02524                                         long count, 
02525                                         TagDescription& tag,
02526                                         MsqError& err )
02527 {
02528   int type = tokens.match_token( vtk_type_names, err );
02529   MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
02530     
02531   void* result = vtk_read_typed_data( tokens, type, 9, count, tag, err );
02532   MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
02533   return result;
02534 }  
02535 
02536 
02537 void MeshImpl::vtk_write_attrib_data( std::ostream& file,
02538                                       const TagDescription& desc,
02539                                       const void* data, size_t count,
02540                                       MsqError& err ) const
02541 {
02542   //srkenno@sandia.gov: we now allow this type to be able to write e.g. GLOBAL_ID for parallel meshes
02543   /*
02544   if (desc.type == HANDLE)
02545   {
02546     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Cannot write HANDLE tag data to VTK file.",
02547                     MsqError::FILE_FORMAT);
02548     return;
02549     }*/
02550   
02551   TagDescription::VtkType vtk_type = desc.vtkType;
02552   unsigned vlen = desc.size / MeshImplTags::size_from_tag_type(desc.type);
02553     // guess one from data length if not set
02554   if (vtk_type == TagDescription::NONE)
02555   {
02556     switch ( vlen )
02557     {
02558       default: vtk_type = TagDescription::SCALAR; break;
02559       case 3: vtk_type = TagDescription::VECTOR; break;
02560       case 9: vtk_type = TagDescription::TENSOR; break;
02561         return;
02562     }
02563   }
02564 
02565   //srkenno@sandia.gov: from class Mesh, the typenames below should correspond in order...
02566   // enum TagType { BYTE, BOOL, INT, DOUBLE, HANDLE };
02567 
02568   const char* const typenames[] = { "unsigned_char", "bit", "int", "double", "unsigned_long" };
02569   std::string field, member;
02570   
02571   int num_per_line;
02572   switch (vtk_type)
02573   {
02574     case TagDescription::SCALAR: 
02575       num_per_line = vlen; 
02576       file << "SCALARS " << desc.name << " " << typenames[desc.type] << " " << vlen << "\n";
02577       file << "LOOKUP_TABLE default\n";
02578       break;
02579     case TagDescription::COLOR : 
02580       num_per_line = vlen;
02581       file << "COLOR_SCALARS " << desc.name << " " << vlen << "\n";
02582       break;
02583     case TagDescription::VECTOR:
02584       num_per_line = 3;
02585       if (vlen != 3)
02586       {
02587         MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::INTERNAL_ERROR,
02588          "Tag \"%s\" is labeled as a VTK vector attribute but has %u values.",
02589          desc.name.c_str(), vlen);
02590         return;
02591       }
02592       file << "VECTORS " << desc.name << " " << typenames[desc.type] << "\n";
02593       break;
02594     case TagDescription::NORMAL:
02595       num_per_line = 3;
02596       if (vlen != 3)
02597       {
02598         MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::INTERNAL_ERROR,
02599          "Tag \"%s\" is labeled as a VTK normal attribute but has %u values.",
02600          desc.name.c_str(), vlen);
02601         return;
02602       }
02603       file << "NORMALS " << desc.name << " " << typenames[desc.type] << "\n";
02604       break;
02605     case TagDescription::TEXTURE:
02606       num_per_line = vlen;
02607       file << "TEXTURE_COORDINATES " << desc.name << " " << typenames[desc.type] << " " << vlen << "\n";
02608       break;
02609     case TagDescription::TENSOR:
02610       num_per_line = 3;
02611       if (vlen != 9)
02612       {
02613         MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::INTERNAL_ERROR,
02614          "Tag \"%s\" is labeled as a VTK tensor attribute but has %u values.",
02615          desc.name.c_str(), vlen);
02616         return;
02617       }
02618       file << "TENSORS " << desc.name << " " << typenames[desc.type] << "\n";
02619       break;
02620     case TagDescription::FIELD:
02621       num_per_line = vlen;
02622       get_field_names( desc, field, member, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
02623       file << member << " " << vlen << " " << count << " " << typenames[desc.type] << "\n";
02624       break;
02625     default:
02626       MSQ_SETERR(err)("Unknown VTK attribute type for tag.", MsqError::INTERNAL_ERROR );
02627       return;
02628   }
02629   
02630   size_t i, total = count*vlen;
02631   char* space = new char[num_per_line];
02632   memset( space, ' ', num_per_line );
02633   space[num_per_line-1] = '\n';
02634   const unsigned char* odata = (const unsigned char*)data;
02635   const bool* bdata = (const bool*)data;
02636   const int* idata = (const int*)data;
02637   const  long* ldata = (const long*)data;
02638   const double* ddata = (const double*)data;
02639   switch ( desc.type )
02640   {
02641     case BYTE:
02642       for (i = 0 ; i < total; ++i)
02643         file << (unsigned int)odata[i] << space[i%num_per_line];
02644       break;
02645     case BOOL:
02646       for (i = 0 ; i < total; ++i)
02647         file << (bdata[i] ? '1' : '0') << space[i%num_per_line];
02648       break;
02649     case INT:
02650       for (i = 0 ; i < total; ++i)
02651         file << idata[i] << space[i%num_per_line];
02652       break;
02653     case DOUBLE:
02654       for (i = 0 ; i < total; ++i)
02655         file << ddata[i] << space[i%num_per_line];
02656       break;
02657     case HANDLE:
02658       for (i = 0 ; i < total; ++i)
02659         file << ldata[i] << space[i%num_per_line];
02660       break;
02661     default:
02662       MSQ_SETERR(err)("Unknown tag type.", MsqError::INTERNAL_ERROR);
02663   }
02664   delete [] space;
02665 }
02666       
02667         
02668           
02669   
02670

02672 /**************************************************************************
02673  *                               TAGS
02674  **************************************************************************/
02675 
02676 
02677 TagHandle MeshImpl::tag_create( const std::string& name,
02678                                 TagType type,
02679                                 unsigned length,
02680                                 const void* defval,
02681                                 MsqError& err )
02682 {
02683   TagDescription::VtkType vtype;
02684   std::string field;
02685   switch( length ) 
02686   {
02687     case 1:  vtype = TagDescription::SCALAR; break;
02688     case 3:  vtype = TagDescription::VECTOR; break;
02689     case 9:  vtype = TagDescription::TENSOR; break;
02690     default: vtype = TagDescription::FIELD;
02691              field = MESQUITE_FIELD_TAG;     break;
02692   }
02693   
02694     // If tag name contains a space, assume the tag name
02695     // is a concatenation of the VTK field and member names.
02696   if (vtype != TagDescription::FIELD &&
02697       name.find(" ") != std::string::npos)
02698     vtype = TagDescription::FIELD;
02699   
02700   size_t size = MeshImplTags::size_from_tag_type( type );
02701   TagDescription desc( name, type, vtype, length*size, field );
02702   size_t index = myTags->create( desc, defval, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
02703   return (TagHandle)index;
02704 }
02705 
02706 void MeshImpl::tag_delete( TagHandle handle, MsqError& err )
02707 {
02708   myTags->destroy( (size_t)handle, err ); MSQ_CHKERR(err);
02709 }
02710 
02711 TagHandle MeshImpl::tag_get( const std::string& name, MsqError& err )
02712 {
02713   size_t index = myTags->handle( name, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
02714   if (!index) 
02715     MSQ_SETERR(err)( MsqError::TAG_NOT_FOUND, "could not find tag \"%s\"", name.c_str() );
02716   return (TagHandle)index;
02717 }
02718 
02719 void MeshImpl::tag_properties( TagHandle handle,
02720                                std::string& name,
02721                                TagType& type,
02722                                unsigned& length,
02723                                MsqError& err )
02724 {
02725   const TagDescription& desc 
02726     = myTags->properties( (size_t)handle, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
02727   
02728   name = desc.name;
02729   type = desc.type;
02730   length = (unsigned)(desc.size / MeshImplTags::size_from_tag_type( desc.type ));
02731 }
